idea: An early-stage e-learning aggregator platform visions to improve educational infrastructure in semi-urban cities by providing personalized learning using machine learning models at a very affordable pricing
name: BIGEGG TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are working on a sandbox fitness mobile application called Fitlete. Our application allows end-users to learn how to exercise by watching professionals, then self-record the exercise, and finally compare with professionals for visual confirmation. It lets people know what they are doing well, and where they need to improve.
name: EXXE FITNESS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Me Citizen provide Indians various contents of government websites on a single portal.

Free Online Complaint website / Free Online Consumer Complaint

*  Shortage of water supply

Mantralaya Department

name: MeCitizen

idea: The company will operate in B2B spectrum as an ecommerce platform providing solutions and services to all stake holders in optical industry. The Company will engage in connecting suppliers and buyers of optical goods and services over its platform. It will offer end-to-end solutions primarily to both these stakeholders in collaboration with various business service partners. The company’s solutions and services aim to profoundly impact the current practices offering corrections across the value chain.
name: SAARTHY INNOVATION SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED
MORSUN COATING SYSTEMS (Prop. Sunil Paint & Varnishes Co. Pvt. Ltd.)

idea:
We are involved in manufacturing of Herbal Liquid Mosquito Repellent and allied products. we successfully
made this breakthrough product which is very effective against mosquitos and doesn't have  any side effects on human body vis-a-vis chemical repellent available in market. As this is our own researched product, we have filled Patent of the same and it is now due  for approval. Our Patent (application) No. 201921001996.. Our Herbal Repellent is certified as chemical- pesticides free product by CSIR - 111M, J & K.  Ministry of Science and Technology, Govt. of INDIA vide their Certificate No. TC 6948. Research is done every day to find ways to fight mosquitoes and market, nowadays, is flooded with a lot of products, from coils, sprays, and lotions to liquids, to keep these small but dangerous insects at bay. Most of these products contain chemicals and poisonous ingredients exposing the user to several health problems and that’s where ‘Goodhealth’ comes into place.
name: HERBAL ROUTE INDIA
